Smart Bin


Back see next project

Building it ....

Smart Bin is a unit of a bigger project referred to as the Smart Waste Management Systems it can also be termed as some sort of backend given that all the data to control the behaviour and chain flow of events will all emanate from it

Technology

The system makes use of a wide range of tools given that it's a purely Mechatronic system,it has three units the mechanical, electrical & electronics and the sofware section. SolidWorks has been used to design the CAD models as well as the simulations, Eagle CadSoft is used to design the PCB and JavaScript and Node js have been used for the software Development, IoT has also been used heavily to establish remote data transmission.

The project is quite huge and fun, its still under development.....
